hours_text:
We are excited to welcome you back to MCASD’s Flagship location in La Jolla. Explore the newly expanded collection galleries, our special exhibitions, sculpture garden, The Shop, and more.

700 Prospect St, La Jolla, CA 92037  
858-454-3541

[Purchase Tickets](https://mcasd.ticketapp.org/portal/pages/mcasd_tickets)

### Hours & Admission

**Monday—Wednesday:** Closed

**Thursday—Saturday:** 11AM—7PM

**Sunday:** 11AM—5PM

**General –** $25

**San Diego County and Tijuana Residents** – $20

**Students, Educators & Older Adults (55+) –** $15

**Members –** Free

Not a Member? [Join Now!](https://mcasd.ticketapp.org/portal/pages/membership)

Free Days

Every **Second Sunday** and **Third Thursday** of the month.

Free Admission

  * 25 and Under, SNAP/EBT Card Holders, Visitors with Disabilities, Military
  * Recipients of federal disability assistance (SSDI, SSI, VA benefits, etc), plus one personal care attendant per visitor
  * Bank of America cardholders receive free general admission every first full weekend of every month

25 & Under is generously provided by [Qualcomm Foundation](https://www.qualcomm.com/company/corporate-responsibility). The Blue Star Museum program at MCASD is generously supported by The Rosso Family Foundation.

Reciprocal Admission

All guests participating in reciprocal admission programs (NARM, ROAM, Mod/Co) can redeem their admission directly at the front desk.

Holidays

Galleries are closed on:

  * Thanksgiving
  * Christmas
  * New Year's Day
 ...

##### Locate Membership

×

To locate and/or renew your MCASD Tickets and Memberships Membership, please **Create an Account**. We will attempt to use the information you enter to locate your existing Membership.

If you have already created an Account, please **Login** and go to _My Account_ → _Profile_ to view your Membership.

[Create Account](/web/20251109163112/https://mcasd.ticketapp.org/portal/register) [Login](/web/20251109163112/https://mcasd.ticketapp.org/portal/auth)
